actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain organizations from private foundation status.

summary.text: Excludes from the definition of "private foundation" under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 those private foundation status for fraternal beneficiary societies and domestic fraternal societies which perform specified functions and which were incorporated before June 1, 1939. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 509(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain organizations from private foundation status.
